 2010-02992010-03-19,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of BEVERLEY S. CLARKE of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
